snippet.title: Cosmic Raider - (1983) - Bally Astrocade - gameplay
snippet.description:
Astrocade © 1983
[Console] Bally Astrocade
Emulator: MAME 0.226

Think Defender!  But dial back the level of complexity by not having to save the little men on the surface of the planet... just fly along the landscape and take down all the enemy fighters.  This is a great game for Bally!  Fast, fun, good sound-effects… select multiple ships, and multiple levels of gameplay.  Great stuff!  So far one of my favorites.
